text:
Special camps to make changes in ration cards for residents in Tiruverumbur and Marungapuri taluks would be held on January 5, according to Collector K. S. Palanisamy. While the camp for Tiruverumbur taluk residents would be held at the Montfort School at Balaji Nagar, the camp for Marungapuri taluk would be held at the Vidiyal Matriculation School near Valanadu Kaikatti. Residents of the taluks can apply for inclusion of names, deletions, corrections in names and changes in addresses in the ration cards during the camp to be held from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m.

All petitions relating to ration cards would be redressed at the camp. Petitioners are required to apply with relevant supporting documents, Mr. Palanisamy said in a press release. Orders on the applications would be issued the same day.
title: Special camps to make changes in ration cards
